| History                 = The Wolves were a gang that were into cutting up people. They were going to cut up the [[Power Pack (Earth-616)|Power Pack kids]] who were sleeping in a subway train. Upon waking up and realizing the danger they were in, the Power Pack kids fought back and the gang members fled in fear, thinking they were mutants.{{r|Power Pack Vol 1 17}} Their father would later encounters members of the gang in a park, while searching for his children. He was assaulted and the gang threatened to cut him up, but was saved by the arrival of [[Tyrone Johnson (Earth-616)|Cloak]].{{r|Power Pack Vol 1 24}}
